analysis.description:
InvestHAT2.sendTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#116-130) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(etherBalance) (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#129-130)

InvestHAT2.HAT2Contract should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#61-63)
InvestHAT2._tokenContract should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#59-60)
InvestHAT2.fundwallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#60-61)
Parameter '_owner' of InvestHAT2.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#141-142) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of InvestHAT2.transfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#150) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of InvestHAT2.transfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#150-151) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of InvestHAT2.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#161) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of InvestHAT2.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#161-162) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of InvestHAT2.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#162) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokensPerEth' of InvestHAT2.updateTokensPerEth (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokensPerAirdrop' of InvestHAT2.updateTokensPerAirdrop (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#98-99) is not in mixedCase
InvestHAT2._tokenContract (/unique_chucks/28/0xd4b409c3219f434cb59fe4568ea6cb9031af5874.sol#59-60) is never used in InvestHAT2
